Description: Neck and shoulder sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) Late Wild Goat (black-figured) pottery krater; cream slip; inside reserved; outside, shoulder glazed with added red band lined in white above frieze; part of a griffin to left; red patch on neck, hind leg and on alternate section of griffin's wing; filling ornament: dotted circles, rosettes, swastikas, pendant roundels; incision used for part of the outline and for details of griffin.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.519)
